reviews.review: No soy un gran fan de los fps pero este juego me dejó enganchado.
Даже не обещали внимание на графику, так как полностью погружен в игру

Although the graphics are not as modern the environment and the monsters in the game are pretty well-designed. This game is type of a game were you play couple of hours every day and just chill while doing so. I would advice you buying the game on sales because its often 90% off! 8.5/10
Great game with an interesting plot. Can be quite challenging at times but that is part of the fun.
Легенда живёт пока есть движ. А ОН МОЖЕТ БЫТЬ ВЕЧЕН! Детство в игре провеедено
великолепная игра для своего времени, жаль габен не делает 3 часть.

I have heard from many different people recently that they believe this game does not hold up in this day and age.  Well, let me disagree super hard.  This game holds up really well if you ask me.  Fans of classic shooters can’t go wrong picking this one up.  Great atmosphere, level design (for the most part!), organic storytelling, and just a fun game in general still even today.  Don’t let the haters discourage you.  If you can’t handle old school graphics, that sounds like a personal problem :p.

Bana göre yıllar geçse de eskimeyen bir oyun.Online için oynuyosanız sadece hikayesini de oynamanızı öneririm.Ayrıca bilmeyenler için remake versiyonu Black Mesa'dır aratırsanız steam da görüceksiniz grafikler mükemmel olmuş onda.Ben bile sıkıldıkça Crossfire  ve Bootbox da oynarım.FPS'in atalarından biridir,tavsiyemdir.
Ммм, ностальгия...А dm тут ничего так.

Great game. I played it way too many times and had way too much fun with it. Everyone should try it out. It's a much better game than any of its ports, remakes, or sequels. Pretty cool story. Still relevant today I think.
Muy buena historia, jugarlo es como volver a mi infancia.
Para um jogo desenvolvido em 1998, possui uma história muito superior a jogos atuais, por N motivos...

Patates pc sahibiyseniz, pc niz sadece 1990 dan kalma oyunları açıyorsa, nostajik oyunları seviyorsanız bu oyun tam size göre. 500 tl ye aldığım laptopta açan bu oyun eğlenmemi sağladı. teşekkürler Half Life

back to the good old days :))) I remember HL being the first PC game that I've ever played when I was 6 or 7 years old, even though I didn't understand a thing back then, just got the HEV suit then I didn't know what else to do.
I like the weapons in the game.
what I don't like about it is that interacting (push/pull) with objects like boxes can be frustrating a lot of times.
Best game ever with a good story!
Its pretty nostalgic and cs mod is actually based on half life!

This is genuinely one of my favourite games of all time. It's fun, the world is interesting and whilst the gunplay isn't the best ever, for it's time, it was amazing. If you've never played it, play it now.
A great classic FPS game everybody should play.

Diooossss es buenisimo un gran juego que hizo toda una revolucion en el genero mucho mas complicado que su predecesor y con una gran historia que tienes que estar al pendiente de lo que sucede Valve siempre hace las cosas con la mas minima atencion al detalle recomendadisimo te dejara enganchado y con un diseño de niveles explendido 10/10 perfecto n.n

A true classic with self-aware A.I. Graphics might look a bit dated compared to Black mesa but it's not too bad. TYhe gameplay and the story is the king here. If you haven't experienced the most celebrated first person action adventure shooter game, then this is for you. It has monsters, guns and the legendary crowbar...
ахуительная хуйня для выделения каловых масс из активного вулканического очка
This is a game where you say "fuck the graphics, I want gameplay".
HUEGH! DARGH! NO! NO! STAHP! HUEGH! HUEG- STAHP! DA-STAH-NO! My gawd! What are you doi- STAHP! I seem to be wounded but I can keep- STAHP!

Es un juego excesivamente bueno. Al principio te puedes quedar bloqueado en algunas zonas por no saber qué hacer exactamente, pero encontrar las soluciones a los problemas que te van surgiendo es muy divertido. Si no te gustan los juegos con malos gráficos, existe una versión actualizada llamada Black Mesa y está muy pero que muy bien remasterizado.
Лучшая игра всех времен и народов, даже сейчас играть не противно :-)
best valve vidoe game every, because of HEALING POOL

10/10
画面虽然很落后了，但是玩起来的感觉真的很棒
Fun and nostalgic, one of my favorite games growing up. Worth getting on sale and playing through again.

I was late to the party with this game, not having played it until almost 20 years after it came out. While its age shows, it didn't hurt it much at all, this was one of the most fun FPS games I've ever played.

I played this game for the first time 20 years after its release. Not sure how that happened, as many people I knew raved about it at the time. I finally understand the hype. The gameplay is incredible and still holds up today. Truly a masterpiece and I am glad I got to finally experience it.
Best PC game of all time.
great game !!! linear levels and nice shooting areas defenetly a msut have !!!
Old, but still stands to what it had, such an outstanding game and the way it shows it story but not tell it its very intriguing.
